data.title: Song: (I've Had) The Time of My Life written by John DeNicola, Donald Markowitz, Franke Previte
meta_keywords: (I've Had) The Time of My Life
data.meta_description: The song (I've Had) The Time of My Life was written by Franke Previte, John DeNicola and Donald Markowitz and was first released by Bill Medley and Jennifer Warnes in 1987. It was covered by Dirty Bit feat. Felony, Party Service Band, Koritni, The Hit Co. and other artists.
data.text:
Adaptations

An adaptation is a musical work, which uses elements (music or lyrics) from another musical work.

Partial adaptations

A partial adaptation is a musical work which integrates only a part of another musical work, and this part is only a fragment of the new musical work.

(I've Had) The Time of My Life written by Franke Previte, John DeNicola, Donald Markowitz
